item.description:
DINNER AND/ OR MOVIE NIGHT
Saturday, June 13, 2009
Dinner: 5:00pm
Movie: 7:00pm
Molly's Restaurant
43 South Main Street #1
Hanover, NH 03755
Host: JanetM; 802-295-5109; Redscarlet56@gmail.com

Come join Janet and her friends for an evening of good food, conversation, and a movie. Planning Coctails 5:00-5:30. Sitting down to dinner at 5:30, but joins us anytime. At Dinner we will discuss what movies we want to see, and where.

Call me any time to find out where we are at, and what movie we are going to.

We are a diverse group of single and coupled active adults with, as well as without children. We are open to all ages and welcome new comers with open arms.

We are all about things to do and people to do them with. We want you to meet other local active adults & friends, who like to get together to walk, bike, hike, ski, skate, dine, dance, camp, snow shoe, kayak, jog (on the beach/in the wooded trails), travel, drumming, motorcycle riding and more. Janet M, Redscarlet56@gmail.com; 802-295-5109
check us out on : www.meetup.com
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Janet M, look for Meetup.com signs, and ask at the Hostess station..

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner & Movie Night
